answers.answer: Im 36 wks and im there right with u! 26 days left im miserable
I just want to punch everyone and everything. -.- I have 25 days.
Haha I feel u. My hubby said "look we all know u hate the world but u gta relax" lol
Same here! I'm 35w wanting this to be over already. I feel miserable and tired
If you have any swellig be sure to mention it to your Dr
My mom made me call today about swelling... I was supposed to go to l&d but I didn't have a way to get there.Bf was at work / still is at work.
Swelling, especially in the hands and face, is a sign of preeclampsia. I would get checked out asap!

Me too I turned 36 weeks today and I feel ya I love my baby but I want her out now I can't take the swollen everything the constant pee breaks the nonslsleeping I mean I can't do my wifely duties its hard to clean house and cook meals for my hubby its hard to have sex with my hubby and that's all I wanna do is simply have sex with him but I can't I think its time us mamas start operation evict our babies

I'm 36 weeks as well and Omgosh I feel the same way ! Got 27 days left for me but I want to get it over with already I feel so heavy n can't sit up on my own n it takes alot of energy to even try n stand up !

question: I am so tired of this. I feel fat. And for the past two days my legs and hands and now I think my face is swelling. I can't even get out of my bed anymore. And I'm not even that big... I wish it was over. Way over.!!!!
title: Rant.!! 36w
